transArray.content: There is a shuttle bus from the hotel to the subway station. It is near the community. The breakfast is good, especially the big TV in the hotel. It is very enjoyable to watch. It costs more than 300 yuan a night in Beijing. The price/performance ratio is very good.

Dear family, the wind between the mountains and the sea and the clouds in the forest are not as good as your eyebrows. You are the brightest scenery! There is no one else in sight, you are everywhere. You chase the world, I chase your back, I love you little man
